definitions.example: He was surrounded, so gave himself up.

definitions.definition: To stop or quit (an activity, etc.)
definitions.example: They gave up the search when it got dark.
He gave up his seat to an old man.

definitions.definition: To lose hope concerning (someone or something)
definitions.example: They gave him up for dead.
I gave up my faith years ago.
OK, I give up, you win.

definitions.definition: Become fully took over by a certain quality, activity, trait, &c.
